page.title: 08New residents in Oakley
page.content: Most people that we talked to came to Oakley because they wanted to live in a village .Everybody likes Oakley because it is small and friendly .When asked what they did not like about Oakley many new residents said "nothing". Two people did not like the lack of buses. Most people had lived in bigger places before ,and said that Oakley was quieter and friendlier than their old residence .Half of the people have been here less than three months .Most people have one or two children ,and most children that are old enough ,go to Oakley School ,they all have cars and use them more than they used to.One has an allotment ,a lot of people say they would like more actvities.
